definitions.definition: Any of a class of monomeric proteins that are soluble in water , and are coagulated by heat ; they occur in egg white , milk etc; they function as carrier protein for steroids , fatty acids , and thyroid hormones and play a role in stabilizing extracellular fluid volume.

main_definition: ( biochemistry ) Any of a class of monomeric proteins that are soluble in water , and are coagulated by heat ; they occur in egg white , milk etc; they function as carrier protein for steroids , fatty acids , and thyroid hormones and play a role in stabilizing extracellular fluid volume.
